text: Reminder: Did you know we have a <https://www.youtube.com/c/HubSpotDevelopers/videos|developer focused YouTube channel>? We do, and itâ€™s where we post a lot of recordings of our developer events, developer case studies, HubSpot Community Developer Show podcast, and Developer Bytes!
Congratulations on all of your hard work! Let the migration begin! <https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OuRjfCcNbYI>
What a great way to get small businesses into HubSpot. That $400 CMS price point was a bit much for a lot of our prospective clients.

<@UBT0AHWLD> it is a starter tier, so it does have some limitations. Most do not directly impact developers. The goal is that our pricing and packaging grows with our customers businesses. A lot of thought and consideration went into the page number and was based on businesses of this size. If it becomes a significant blocker to selling the CMS to businesses of this size, continue providing your feedback. We're always listening.
